mapper.select: SELECT A.TEXT_ID , A.RTRV_CNT , A.TEXT_TITL , A.BORD_TYPE , A.IMPT_YN , A.EVENT_TERM , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM kf99.TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.WRTR) USER_NAME , date_format( A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DT , CASE WHEN B.FILE_NUM > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FILE_YN , B.FILE_NUM , B.FILE_NAME FROM kf99.TB_EVENT_BORD A LEFT OUTER JOIN kf99.TB_EVENT_FILE_MGMT B ON A.TEXT_ID = B.TEXT_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.IMPT_YN DESC, A.TEXT_ID
SELECT A.TEXT_ID , A.TEXT_TITL , IFNULL(C.TEXT_CONT, '정보없음') TEXT_CONT FROM TB_EVENT_BORD A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EVENT_TEXT_CONT C ON A.TEXT_ID = C.TEXT_ID WHERE A.TEXT_ID = #{text_id}
SELECT A.CONT_IMAG_DATA , A.CONT_IMAG_NAME FROM TB_EVENT_BORD_IMAG A WHERE A.TEXT_ID = #{text_id}
SELECT * FROM kf99.TT_EVENT_DATE WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND TEXT_ID = #{text_id}

SELECT SUM(DATE1) as DATE1 , SUM(DATE2) as DATE2 , SUM(DATE3) as DATE3 , SUM(DATE4) as DATE4 , SUM(TIME1) as TIME1 , SUM(TIME2) as TIME2 , SUM(TIME3) as TIME3 , SUM(TIME4) as TIME4 , SUM(TIME5) as TIME5 , SUM(TIME6) as TIME6 , SUM(TIME7) as TIME7 FROM kf99.TT_EVENT_DATE WHERE TEXT_ID = #{text_id} GROUP BY TEXT_ID

SELECT TEXT_ID , ( SELECT USER_NAME FROM kf99.TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.USER_ID ) USER_NAME , COMMENT , date_format(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%I:%S') REG_DT FROM kf99.TB_EVENT_BOARD_REVIEW A WHERE 1=1 AND TEXT_ID = #{text_id} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
SELECT FILE_NAME ,FILE_DATA FROM kf99.TB_EVENT_FILE_MGMT WHERE TEXT_ID = #{textId} AND FILE_NUM = #{fileNumber}
